title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 240-3.1 - Procedures for determining regional transportation-related emissions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 240-3.1 - Procedures for determining regional transportation-related emissions

State Regulations

Written commitments to control measures that are not
included in the transportation plan and TIP must be obtained prior to a
conformity determination and must demonstrate assurance that they will be
fulfilled. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
240-3.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
